name: Bond 710
Prod_desc: Bond 710 is a premium Boiling Water Proof Marine Grade plywood from CenturyPly and  it is completely waterproof in nature. Made with pre-pressing which gives it enhanced durability and longer life, it has more number of plies for added strength. It is Borer & Termite proof, protecting your interiors from untimely decaying. Bond 710 comes with a 15 year warranty.
